title: Super Ultra Mega Giga Galaxy Word Master

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Challenge a player to duel... in WORDLE.
https://wordletogether.com/
(First player to get the word in real time wins, regardless of how many attempts/6)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Duels occur publicly at the end of the day.
If you lose the duel, you lose your defense for the rest of the game.
If you win the duel, you attack the opponent immediately. If they survive this attack, they will be roleblocked the following night.
